name: Scorpion Mountain
description:
Created for the TV Game Jam.

Sound Effects from https://kenney.nl/.

Controls/Rules:

  • Left Click to play a card from the bottom row
    • Cards played go to your discard at the end of turn
  • Left Click to buy a card from the center row
    • Bought cards go immediately to your discard
  • Discarded cards are shuffled into your deck when you run out of cards
  • Left Click on buttons in the top row to put money into a challenge
    • Reward/Penalty cards go immediately to your hand
    • Only one part of a challenge can be completed (or failed)
  • Retired cards go to the center row discard and are no longer in your deck
  • Reaching 100 opposition ends the game
  • Completing the final challenge wins the game
  • You draw

Bugs:

  • Sometimes when restarting the game, cards get stuck in the bottom left. 
    • As a workaround: run your mouse over the cards.
